channel.title: Lost Island - NEW - Looking for Mods and Admins!
channel.description:
[size=24pt][b]WEBSITE and WEBCLIENT[/b][/size]: [url=http://www.lostisland-rsps.org]http://www.lostisland-rsps.org[/url]
[center][font=arial black][size=24pt]Bosses![/size][/font][/center] [center][size=14pt]Penance Queen![/size][/center] [center]Drops Sigils, Spirit Sheilds, and much more![/center] [center][IMG]http://img1.UploadScreenshot.com/images/main/6/17411285877.jpg[/img][/center]
[center][size=14pt]Bandos![/size][/center] [center][IMG]http://img1.UploadScreenshot.com/images/main/6/17411321960.jpg[/img][/center]
[center][size=14pt]Armadyle![/size][/center]
[center][size=24pt][font=Impact]Mining & Smithing![/font][/size][/center]
[center][size=14pt]Custom Ores & Bars![/size][/center] [center][IMG]http://img1.UploadScreenshot.com/images/main/6/17411382098.jpg[/img][/center]
[center][img]http://www.google.com/images/server_uploads/12739_12733.png[/img][/center]
[center][size=14pt]Very weak ore![/size](100 Coal Required) [size=14pt]Weak Ore![/size](500 Coal Required) [IMG]http://img1.UploadScreenshot.com/images/thumb/6/17411475940.jpg[/img] [IMG]http://img1.UploadScreenshot.com/images/thumb/6/17411503361.jpg[/img] [size=14pt] Standard Ore![/size](800 Coal Required) [size=14pt]Standard Plus Ore![/size](1200 Coal Required) [IMG]http://img1.UploadScreenshot.com/images/thumb/6/17411520825.jpg[/img] [IMG]http://img1.UploadScreenshot.com/images/thumb/6/17411532540.jpg[/img][/center]
[center][font=impact][size=24pt]Fully Working Clue Scrolls![/size][/font][/center] [center][IMG]http://img1.UploadScreenshot.com/images/main/6/17412473019.jpg[/img][/center]
[center][IMG]http://img1.UploadScreenshot.com/images/main/6/17412500589.jpg[/img][/center]
[center][font=impact][size=24pt]Barrows![/size][/font][/center] Each Key gives a 50% chance of getting a part of that set! Kill barrows brothers to get keys! You can get a visage key also which gives you a Dragonfire Sheild! [center][IMG]http://img1.UploadScreenshot.com/images/main/6/17413455070.jpg[/img][/URL][/center]
[center][IMG]http://img1.UploadScreenshot.com/images/main/6/17414065387.jpg[/img] [IMG]http://img1.UploadScreenshot.com/images/main/6/17413543330.jpg[/img][/center]
[center][font=impact][size=24pt]Unique Slayer![/size][/font][/center] You receive a certain amount of slayer experience per kill. You receive more as the level of the slayer monsters increases!
[center]Exchange At combat Instructor![/center] [center][IMG]http://img1.UploadScreenshot.com/images/main/6/17610451162.jpg[/img][/center]
[center]Unique Rewards From Each Monster![/center] [center][IMG]http://img1.UploadScreenshot.com/images/main/6/17610460073.jpg[/img][/center]
[center][font=impact][color=purple][size=24pt]Credits:[/size][/font][/center]
[size=14pt]Smitty: Making the server[/size] [size=14pt]Squirrly24: for lending me a lot of items to make this advertisement.[/size] [size=14pt]Me:Making this :)[/size]
Ps. Let me know if im missing anything -Gino

item.title: Lost Island - NEW - Looking for Mods and Admins!
item.dc:creator: @parkview parkview
item.description:
@parkview wrote:

ITS NOT COPY PASTE AND I HAVNT FOLLOWED ONE TUTORIAL. LOOK AT THE PICS, since when can you examine an npc to find out his top drops? ::pvpon skulls you and makes you fightable anywhere! Havnt seen those tuts?

And I’m not gunna get a vps or pay to remove ads when I only got ~10 players online.

Read full topic
item.source: Lost Island - NEW - Looking for Mods and Admins!

item.title: Lost Island - NEW - Looking for Mods and Admins!
item.dc:creator: @parkview parkview
item.description:
@parkview wrote:

Ruby , you havn’t logged in and I havn’t followed any tutorial tbh. I have an old source, and did not do any copy pasting what so ever. Anyways, your just trolling. It would be nice to have decent people on these forums so we can actually get things done (I know there are still some of you who are respectful)

Read full topic

item.title: Lost Island - NEW - Looking for Mods and Admins!
item.dc:creator: @parkview parkview
item.description:
@parkview wrote:

I love how you guys are all showing off, I dont have time to advertise a server, im always coding and have irl things to do. I am about to graduate in computer science where I took many java courses. But I do admit, I am lazy and it’s not a good thing lol and why so much hate?

Ps. Fixed the pictures

Read full topic

item.title: Lost Island - NEW - Looking for Mods and Admins!
item.dc:creator: @arham_4 arham 4
item.description:
@arham_4 wrote:

[quote=“Ruby, post:5, topic:445907”][quote author=parkview link=topic=548771.msg4025463#msg4025463 date=1340307857]
Yea, but I’m too lazy to make a decent advertisement page, too busy coding tbh.
[/quote]
Wanna know how we all make successful servers and yours sits with 15players?

We’re not lazy, not in it for the money and we actually know what we’re doing. If you’re gonna own a server, don’t half ass it.[/quote]
He has only 15 players? Lol, my team is 2/3 of that lol. I have 10 coders, and we all aren’t in it for money.

Try to be confident and don’t be lazy like ruby said.

Read full topic

item.title: Lost Island - NEW - Looking for Mods and Admins!
item.dc:creator: @Ruby_Forums_Coder Ruby
item.description:
@Ruby_Forums_Coder wrote:

There’s quite a few things required here.

1 - Get your pictures working, otherwise you won’t attract any players from here.
2 - I also suggest you get domains relevant to your server, even if they are free domains, you need to make them all the same for users to remember them easily.
3 - You should elaborate on your custom skills.

Read full topic
